content: Yes, you can definitely make the egg muffins ahead of time and reheat them in the morning. You can store them in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 4 days. To reheat, simply place them in the microwave for 30-60 seconds, or until heated through. You can also freeze them for up to 3 months if you want to make a larger batch. To reheat from frozen, microwave them for 1-2 minutes or bake them in the oven for 15-20 minutes at 350°F.
